2025-12-05.content: You can import Terraform modules to create components [(Preview)](https://cloud.google.com/products#product-launch-stages). For more information, see [Import components](https://docs.cloud.google.com/application-design-center/docs/import-components).

summary.title: Import Terraform modules
summary.summary: You can now import Terraform modules to create components. This feature is currently in Preview.

2025-12-05.content: You can set up Application Design Center using a single project boundary. For more information, see [Set up Application Design Center](https://docs.cloud.google.com/application-design-center/docs/setup).

summary.title: Application Design Center Setup
summary.summary: Application Design Center can now be set up within a single project boundary.

2025-12-05.content:
Application Design Center [supports](https://docs.cloud.google.com/application-design-center/docs/supported-resources) the following components:

* Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE) Node Pool
* GKE Standard Cluster
* GKE Autopilot Cluster
* Firestore

summary.title: Application Design Center
summary.summary: Check out the latest features of Application Design Center!

2025-12-05.content: You can export Terraform to your code repository. For more information, see [Export Terraform code](https://docs.cloud.google.com/application-design-center/docs/download-and-deploy#export_terraform_code).

summary.title: Terraform Export
summary.summary: Export your Terraform code to your repository.

2025-12-05.content:
Application Design Center is generally available [(GA)](https://cloud.google.com/products#product-launch-stages), including the following:

* [Application Design Center Google Cloud CLI](https://docs.cloud.google.com/sdk/gcloud/reference/design-center).
* [Design Center API](https://docs.cloud.google.com/application-design-center/docs/reference/rest).

summary.title: Application Design Center is Generally Available
summary.summary: Application Design Center is now generally available. This includes the Application Design Center Google Cloud CLI and the Design Center API.
